allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$login = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://centromundox-backend-947baa9d183e.herokuapp.com/auth/login'' -Method POST -ContentType ''application/json'' -Body ''{""email"":""fescalona@correo.unimet.edu.ve"",""password"":""Link420/""}''
$token = $login.access_token
$headers = @{ Authorization = ""Bearer $token"" }
$data = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://centromundox-backend-947baa9d183e.herokuapp.com/lab-reservations'' -Headers $headers

$total = $data.Count
$recurrent = \($data | Where-Object { $_.recurrenceGroupId }\).Count
$individual = \($data | Where-Object { -not $_.recurrenceGroupId }\).Count
$pending = \($data | Where-Object { $_.status -eq ''pending'' }\).Count
$pendingRecurrent = \($data | Where-Object { $_.status -eq ''pending'' -and $_.recurrenceGroupId }\).Count
$pendingIndividual = \($data | Where-Object { $_.status -eq ''pending'' -and -not $_.recurrenceGroupId }\).Count
$groups = \($data | Where-Object { $_.recurrenceGroupId } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty recurrenceGroupId -Unique\).Count

Write-Host ''=== TOTAL ===''
Write-Host ""Total reservas: $total""
Write-Host ""Recurrentes: $recurrent""
Write-Host ""Individuales: $individual""
Write-Host ''''
Write-Host ''=== PENDIENTES ===''
Write-Host ""Total pendientes: $pending""
Write-Host ""Recurrentes pendientes: $pendingRecurrent""
Write-Host ""Individuales pendientes: $pendingIndividual""
Write-Host ''''
Write-Host ''=== GRUPOS UNICOS ===''
Write-Host ""Grupos recurrentes unicos: $groups""
")
